p_62: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_66: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*

th_95: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_98: RUHS Radiology is a recently formed clinical year integrated 5-year program with experienced faculty and ongoing accreditation. Our residents receive one on one teaching, faculty led didactic lectures and protected weekly Tuesday afternoon research time. Our level I trauma hospital serves a wide spectrum of patients with recently upgraded imaging equipment including PET/CT and MBI cameras.
